title: 1  Introduction
text:
1.5 Exercise
convert() function

days = 365
days_float = convert(Float64, days) # Convert to Float64

365.0



days == days_float 

true



@assert days == 365
@assert days_float == 365.0


convert(Int64, "1") # Error


parse(Int64, "1")

1
